name: Daily Conference Meetings
query:
SELECT
    conference_room AS "Conference Room:Link/Conference Room:150",
    meeting_title AS "Meeting:Data:150",
    client_name AS "Client:Data:150",
    TIME_FORMAT(start_time, '%%H:%%i') AS "Start Time:Time:90",
    TIME_FORMAT(end_time, '%%H:%%i') AS "End Time:Time:90",
    booking_date AS "Date:Date:100",
    status AS "Status:Data:100"
FROM `tabConference Booking`
WHERE
    booking_date = CURDATE()
    AND status IN ('Confirmed', 'Reserved')
ORDER BY
    conference_room,
    start_time;
